params._decimals: The base decimals for float calc, for example 1000
params._levelRate: The bonus rate for each level, which will divide by decimals too. The max depth is MAX_REFER_DEPTH.
params._onlyRewardActiveReferrers: The flag to enable not paying to inactive uplines.
params._refereeBonusRateMap: The bonus rate mapping to each referree amount, which will divide by decimals too. The max depth is MAX_REFER_DEPTH. The map should be pass as [<lower amount>, <rate>, ....]. For example, you should pass [1, 250, 5, 500, 10, 1000] when decimals is 1000 for the following case.   *  25%     50%     100%  | ----- | ----- |-----> 1ppl    5ppl    10ppl
params._referralBonus: The total referral bonus rate, which will divide by decimals. For example, If you will like to set as 5%, it can set as 50 when decimals is 1000.
params._secondsUntilInactive: The seconds that a user does not update will be seen as inactive.

getRefereeBonusRate(uint256).details: Given a user amount to calc in which rate period

getTime().details: Get block timestamp with function for testing mock

hasReferrer(address).details: Utils function for check whether an address has the referrer

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
